name: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Broadway Musicals - Show Boat / Annie Get Your Gun / Seven Brides For Seven Brothers / Kiss Me Kate

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Broadway Musicals - Show Boat / Annie Get Your Gun / Seven Brides For Seven Brothers / Kiss Me Kate
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed to find this pack of movies. For less than $5 each you get Kiss Me Kate, 7 Brides for 7 Brothers, Show Boat, and Annie Get Your Gun. Some of these movies are hard to find, and some retail for $20 each elsewhere. Not all of them are in Widescreen, but some of them, such as Kiss Me Kate was never made in a widescreen version. I highly recommend this for someone who loves musical classics and Howard Keel's booming voice.
reviews.title: Best of the Classics

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Broadway Musicals - Show Boat / Annie Get Your Gun / Seven Brides For Seven Brothers / Kiss Me Kate
reviews.reviewText: 12 bucks for four classics? Awesome deal! I was searching just for seven brides for seven brothers but found this deal for just two dollars more.
reviews.title: Awesome deal!

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Broadway Musicals - Show Boat / Annie Get Your Gun / Seven Brides For Seven Brothers / Kiss Me Kate
reviews.reviewText: These are theatre classics brought to film. I am sure they were just as good on stage.
reviews.title: more great musicals

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Broadway Musicals - Show Boat / Annie Get Your Gun / Seven Brides For Seven Brothers / Kiss Me Kate
reviews.reviewText: If you love watching musicals, you should enjoy this DVD. My favorite is Seven Brides for Seven Brothers. I wasn't truly impressed with the Kiss Me Kate story line. But since you get all four films in one package, the overall price is a nice deal.
reviews.title: 02 November 2010

reviews.name: TCM Greatest Classic Films: Broadway Musicals - Show Boat / Annie Get Your Gun / Seven Brides For Seven Brothers / Kiss Me Kate
reviews.reviewText: I love musicals and to have all these 4 is great! Played them over & over. If you are into musicals, you will love this
reviews.title: Loved It
